effusion.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a liquid or gas that flows out of something, or the act of flowing out
effusion.translation[0].definitions[0].e: a massive effusion of poisonous gas
effusion.translation[0].definitions[1].d: an uncontrolled expression of strong good feelings
effusion.translation[0].definitions[1].e: He greeted the guests with effusion.
